import React from 'react' import { useState } from 'react' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faPlus } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' const PersonForm = (props) => { const [showForm, setShowForm] = useState('') const handleShowForm = (event) => { event.preventDefault() showForm ? setShowForm('open') : setShowForm('') } return (
name:
number:
) } export default PersonForm
